solution.text:
Total no. of outcomes on rolling a pair of dice \(=36\)
No. of outcomes such that the sum of the two numbers is greater than \(10\) \(=3\)
Sample space :\([(5,6),(6,5), (6,6)]\)
Probability \(=\frac{3}{36}\)
\(=\frac{1}{12}\)

content.text: The sum of the two numbers greater than \(10\)?
